GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
sfc: fix considering that all channels have TX queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 8f81a4113e1e574d2cbde4f2cd599380a9189c0f, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 8700aff089843399f95bc7701ae87b642b35a716. For more details please see the references link.
